author: sandygao
msg: JIRA Issue #1480: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/XERCESJ-1480. Bug fix: precision decimal comparison. a) In compareTo(), if the other value is NaN, should return INDETERMINATE. b) If one value is +0 and the other -0, should return equal. c) In equals(), if both are NaN, treat as equal.

author: cutting
msg: AVRO-693. Java: Configure Velocity to use null logger.  Contributed by Stephen Gargan.
